name: ChemJava
tagline: A Java application to solve some basic chemistry equations
body:
### Welcome to ChemJava!
This is a basic Java application which can solve many equations often found in a high school Chemistry class.  Simply follow the directions in the output window and you will be solving equations in no time!

### Authors and Contributors
Richie Lazear (@richardlazear) and Dominik Verstovsek (@dverstovsek)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
